sense.def:
One's presence in a place
je dejstvo, da je neka oseba na določenem mestu.

seg.quote: He tried to justify his presence in Belfast.
He had to cope with the presence of her family.

sense.def:
Kdor je
in someone's presence
, je na istem kraju kot neka druga oseba.

seg.quote: I felt comfortable in her presence.
Haldane repeated his statement in the presence of the chairman.

sense.def:
To have presence
pomeni narediti vtis s svojo zunanjostjo in vedênjem.
